attributes.action: Make concessions for teaching staff for holidays during the summer break.
attributes.background: People in the teaching profession are not able to take holiday or leave during term time and so are penalised by the increase in cost for holidays and flights. Many can’t afford to holiday because of this increase.There should be concessions made for those who can prove they are in this profession.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on travel companies to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament.
